abilities.name: Disk Reload
abilities.effect: Once during your turn (before your attack), you may draw cards until you have 5 cards in your hand.

attacks.name: Brave Buddies
attacks.effect: If you played a Supporter card from your hand during this turn, this attack does 70 more damage.

attacks.name: Silver Knight GX
attacks.effect: If your opponent’s Active Pokémon is an Ultra Beast, it is Knocked Out. (You can’t use more than 1 GX attack in a game.)
